## MondrianBuiltinWsClient class

builtin websocket based data client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MondrianBuiltinWsClient extends MondrianDataClient 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [MondrianDataClient](./mondrian.mondriandataclient.md)

## Remarks

default websocket based data client, auto sync data from/to remote ws server.
